sentences.en: And as manufacturing jobs and semiskilled office positions disappear, much of this vast, nonprofessional middle class is drifting downward.
sentences.cn: 随着制造业中的工作和半熟练的办公室职业消失，这类中产阶级的数量大量下滑。

sentences.en: And as manufacturing jobs and semiskilled office positions disappear, much of this vast, nonprofessional middle class is drifting downward.
sentences.cn: 随着制造业的工作岗位和半熟练的办公室岗位的消失，广大的、非专业的中产阶级当中的大部分人都在向下漂移。

sentences.en: Branded an intellectual, he spent 10 years working as a semiskilled laborer at the Beijing Heavy Machinery Factory.
sentences.cn: 带着知识分子的烙印，余先生在北京重机械厂作为半成品工人工作了10年。

trans.tran_en: A semiskilled worker has some training and skills, but not enough to do specialized work
